channel.title: New Website on Anirudh Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in New Website on Anirudh Sharma

item.title: Got a new site,
item.description: Our new website is now hosted at www.sparsh-i.com. The Vimeo Video on the homepage made it popular and hit the digg frontpage :) ! its a great feeling ! The video received more than 30 comments in 24 hours of launching http://vimeo.com/2953423
